today1.speakText: As of today, total sales is 9 Lakh and 91 Thousand taka  yet, and till now target is 79 Lakh and 42 Thousand taka . The sales  of Poultry is 5 Lakh and 85 Thousand taka <break time='0.1s'/> with <say-as interpret-as='cardinal'>9.55</say-as>% achievement yet. <break time='0.5s'/>   We have <say-as interpret-as='cardinal'>57</say-as> new customers today.
